name: Organic Insurgence
description:
• Help the citizens free themselves from The Mechanism, a rouge AI that enslaved those it was supposed to help.
  • Explore ever shifting dungeons in an attempt to destroy three autonomous robots that act as backup nodes for the Mechanism. 
  • Interact with procedural NPCs to gain new weapons and learn more about life under the mechanism.
  • Find your play style with four different weapon types. Each weapon is procedurally generated and many can be found throughout the dungeons.
Keyboard Controls:

Move:  WASD
Strafe: Shift/Right Mouse Button
Attack:  Left Mouse Button  
Pickup/Interact: E
Player Stats/Save: Q
Fullscreen: Alt + Enter / F11
Dev Console: ~

Gamepad Controls:

Move:  D-Pad
Strafe: Left Bumper
Attack:  Right Bumper  
Pickup/Interact: X (Xbox) or Square (DualShock)
